page.title: 17DAY IN LIFE OF PAULINE (11)
page.content: I wake about 7 I amble downstairs to find breakfast and my mum.Mum goes to work at 8.30 and we go to school.I stop off at the school pond.After the whistle we scramble into school.I go to the hall to play my recorder in the orchestra.The morning I might spend doing Maths, English, Topic, Science, Art, Music or whatever.We have a break at 10.30 and lunch at 12.On Fridays I eat quickly as I have Nature club, news of plants and animals and the back breaking and knee scratching affair of gardening. During the afternoon we may have P.E. and story which is my favourite. We bundle out of school at 3.30 but I stay on for science club which is riddled with computers, printers, experiments and robots! After a hurried dinner I go to Guides at 7 then have a quick supper before bed which I am glad to see.
